trans-unit.id:
**%@ License Issue Detected**
This installation has been remotely deactivated, or the hardware identifiers have changed since the last license activation. This may have occurred due to a hardware upgrade or migration to a new device.
Please reactivate this installation to continue using Pro features.
trans-unit.source:
**%@ License Issue Detected**
This installation has been remotely deactivated, or the hardware identifiers have changed since the last license activation. This may have occurred due to a hardware upgrade or migration to a new device.
Please reactivate this installation to continue using Pro features.
trans-unit.target:
**%@ Licensproblem upptäckts**
Den här installationen har avaktiverats på distans, eller så har maskinvaruidentifierarna ändrats sedan den senaste licensaktiveringen. Detta kan ha inträffat på grund av en maskinvaruuppgradering eller migrering till en ny enhet.
Återaktivera installationen för att fortsätta använda Pro-funktionerna.

trans-unit.id:
**%@ Outdated License**
The provided license was originally issued for an earlier version of %@ and has already been extended once with a complimentary upgrade to a subsequent major version.
This license no longer covers the current app version (v%@). To use this version of %@, please purchase a new license.
Thank you for your understanding and continued support.
trans-unit.source:
**%1$@ Outdated License**
The provided license was originally issued for an earlier version of %2$@ and has already been extended once with a complimentary upgrade to a subsequent major version.
This license no longer covers the current app version (v%3$@). To use this version of %4$@, please purchase a new license.
Thank you for your understanding and continued support.

trans-unit.id: A display group can cover all displays (with an optionally specified list of exceptions) or may consist of a specific list of displays. Display group membership may determine the activation status of the display group (depending on activation policy settings) and influence how display group based features behave.
trans-unit.source: A display group can cover all displays (with an optionally specified list of exceptions) or may consist of a specific list of displays. Display group membership may determine the activation status of the display group (depending on activation policy settings) and influence how display group based features behave.
trans-unit.target: En skärmgrupp kan omfatta alla skärmar (med en valfritt specificerad lista med undantag) eller bestå av en specifik lista med skärmar. Medlemskap i en skärmgrupp kan avgöra skärmgruppens aktiveringsstatus (beroende på inställningar för aktiveringspolicy) och påverka hur skärmgruppsbaserade funktioner beter sig.

trans-unit.id: A display group with the name '%@' already exists.
trans-unit.source: A display group with the name '%@' already exists.
trans-unit.target: En skärmgrupp med namnet '%@' finns redan.

trans-unit.id: A display is present which is not fully controllable without the app
trans-unit.source: A display is present which is not fully controllable without the app
trans-unit.target: Det finns en skärm som inte är helt kontrollerbar utan appen

trans-unit.id: A higher priority display group marked as exclusive is active.
trans-unit.source: A higher priority display group marked as exclusive is active.
trans-unit.target: En skärmgrupp med högre prioritet som är markerad som exklusiv är aktiv.

trans-unit.id: A less than 720p desktop resolution is not ideal for macOS usability as GUI elements might not fit. This affects virtual screens as well as the resolution slider for displays.
trans-unit.source: A less than 720p desktop resolution is not ideal for macOS usability as GUI elements might not fit. This affects virtual screens as well as the resolution slider for displays.
trans-unit.target: En skrivbordsupplösning på mindre än 720p är inte idealisk för macOS användbarhet eftersom GUI-element kanske inte passar. Detta påverkar virtuella skärmar såväl som upplösningsreglaget för bildskärmar.

trans-unit.id: A popup notification will appear when the app detects interference from other apps that adjust the color table. Useful for troubleshooting.
trans-unit.source: A popup notification will appear when the app detects interference from other apps that adjust the color table. Useful for troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: Ett popup-meddelande visas när appen upptäcker störningar från andra appar som justerar färgtabellen. Användbart för felsökning.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen is similar to a real display but exists only in the virtual space (in the computer's memory). You can use it to show it in a PIP window, stream or mirror its content to a real display or use it as a source for screen recording or screencast via an appropriate app.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen is similar to a real display but exists only in the virtual space (in the computer's memory). You can use it to show it in a PIP window, stream or mirror its content to a real display or use it as a source for screen recording or screencast via an appropriate app.
trans-unit.target: En virtuell skärm liknar en riktig skärm men finns bara i det virtuella utrymmet (i datorns minne). Du kan använda den för att visa den i ett PIP-fönster, streama eller spegla dess innehåll till en riktig skärm eller använda den som källa för skärminspelning eller screencast via en lämplig app.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect or disconnect when the associated display is connected or disconnected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect or disconnect when the associated display is connected or disconnected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: En virtuell skärm som är associerad med en bildskärm ansluts eller kopplas bort automatiskt när den associerade bildskärmen ansluts eller kopplas bort. Du kan inaktivera automatisk anslutning för associerade virtuella skärmar.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect when the associated display is connected. All other virtual screens were connected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect when the associated display is connected. All other virtual screens were connected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: En virtuell skärm som är associerad med en skärm ansluts automatiskt när den associerade skärmen ansluts. Alla andra virtuella skärmar var anslutna. Du kan inaktivera automatisk anslutning för associerade virtuella skärmar.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically disconnect when the associated display is disconnected. All other virtual screens were disconnected. You can disable auto-disconnect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically disconnect when the associated display is disconnected. All other virtual screens were disconnected. You can disable auto-disconnect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: En virtuell skärm som är kopplad till en skärm kopplas automatiskt bort när den tillhörande skärmen kopplas bort. Alla andra virtuella skärmar kopplades bort. Du kan inaktivera automatisk frånkoppling för associerade virtuella skärmar.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will connect or disconnect automatically when the associated display is connected or disconnected.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will connect or disconnect automatically when the associated display is connected or disconnected.
trans-unit.target: En virtuell skärm som är associerad med en skärm kommer att anslutas eller kopplas bort automatiskt när den associerade skärmen ansluts eller kopplas bort.

trans-unit.id: Abandon waiting for a response or call completion after the specified time interval.
trans-unit.source: Abandon waiting for a response or call completion after the specified time interval.
trans-unit.target: Avbryt väntan på svar eller slutförande av anrop efter den angivna tidsperioden.

trans-unit.id: Accessibility Permissions are configured but the **app still needs to be restarted** for the changes to take effect! Please close and restart the app when it is convenient or press the "Restart %@" button below to restart the app immediately!
trans-unit.source: Accessibility Permissions are configured but the **app still needs to be restarted** for the changes to take effect! Please close and restart the app when it is convenient or press the "Restart %@" button below to restart the app immediately!
trans-unit.target: Tillgänglighetsbehörigheter har konfigurerats men **appen måste fortfarande startas om** för att ändringarna ska träda i kraft! Stäng och starta om appen när det passar dig eller tryck på knappen "Starta om %@" nedan för att starta om appen omedelbart!

trans-unit.id: Accessibility Permissions are properly configured. Native (Apple) keyboard brightness and volume keys should work if these features are otherwise set up. If not, please try restarting the app!
trans-unit.source: Accessibility Permissions are properly configured. Native (Apple) keyboard brightness and volume keys should work if these features are otherwise set up. If not, please try restarting the app!

trans-unit.id: Activated only when the display is not set as main so it does not interfere with the lock screen. Most displays do not support turning the backlight off or back on via DDC.
trans-unit.source: Activated only when the display is not set as main so it does not interfere with the lock screen. Most displays do not support turning the backlight off or back on via DDC.

trans-unit.id: Adjust the offset of the two displays by modifying the anchor points. Layout protection tries to arrange the displays so they line up at the defined anchor points horizontally or vertically. The default setting is to line up displays in a centered way.
trans-unit.source: Adjust the offset of the two displays by modifying the anchor points. Layout protection tries to arrange the displays so they line up at the defined anchor points horizontally or vertically. The default setting is to line up displays in a centered way.
trans-unit.target: Justera förskjutningen av de två skärmarna genom att ändra ankarpunkterna. Layoutskyddet försöker ordna skärmarna så att de står i linje med de definierade ankarpunkterna horisontellt eller vertikalt. Standardinställningen är att ställa upp skärmarna centrerat.

After discarding a virtual screen, it is recommended to remove its unused factory color profile as well.

trans-unit.target: Ger åtkomst till appens funktioner via HTTP-förfrågningar.

trans-unit.id: Allows only one device to show more options via the more options chevron. This helps with menu bloating when several displays are present.
trans-unit.source: Allows only one device to show more options via the more options chevron. This helps with menu bloating when several displays are present.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter att endast en enhet visar fler alternativ via chevron för fler alternativ. Det här hjälper till att minska uppsvällda menyer när flera skärmar används.

trans-unit.id: Allows restoring zero software brightness levels and combined brightness levels with the hardware brightness component being lower than the current reported brightness level for Apple displays (these might be invalid restore values saved during a dark wake period).
trans-unit.source: Allows restoring zero software brightness levels and combined brightness levels with the hardware brightness component being lower than the current reported brightness level for Apple displays (these might be invalid restore values saved during a dark wake period).
trans-unit.target: Gör det möjligt att återställa noll ljusstyrkenivåer för programvara och kombinerade ljusstyrkenivåer med hårdvarans ljusstyrkekomponent som är lägre än den aktuella rapporterade ljusstyrkenivån för Apple-skärmar (dessa kan vara ogiltiga återställningsvärden som sparats under en mörk väckningsperiod).

trans-unit.id: Allows scripted CLI access and third party app integration using notification dispatch (see [documentation](https://betterdisplay.pro/integration)).
trans-unit.source: Allows scripted CLI access and third party app integration using notification dispatch (see [documentation](https://betterdisplay.pro/integration)).
trans-unit.target: Tillåter skriptad CLI-åtkomst och integrering av appar från tredje part med hjälp av meddelandeutskick (se [dokumentation](https://betterdisplay.pro/integration)).

trans-unit.id: Allows some fancy animation for the nits counter and provides visual feedback for upscaling in style. Disable for a somewhat more muted presentation.
trans-unit.source: Allows some fancy animation for the nits counter and provides visual feedback for upscaling in style. Disable for a somewhat more muted presentation.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter lite snygg animation för nits-räknaren och ger visuell feedback för uppskalning i stil. Avaktivera för en något mer dämpad presentation.

trans-unit.id: Allows switching to an unexposed refresh rate configured through the Configuration Protection feature when an appropriate standard mode is unavailable. Disable this option if you encounter issues while attempting to protect a refresh rate setting.
trans-unit.source: Allows switching to an unexposed refresh rate configured through the Configuration Protection feature when an appropriate standard mode is unavailable. Disable this option if you encounter issues while attempting to protect a refresh rate setting.
trans-unit.target: Gör det möjligt att växla till en oexponerad uppdateringsfrekvens som konfigurerats via funktionen Konfigurationsskydd när ett lämpligt standardläge inte är tillgängligt. Avaktivera det här alternativet om du stöter på problem när du försöker skydda en inställning för uppdateringsfrekvensen.

trans-unit.id: Allows systemwide URLs (see [documentation](https://betterdisplay.pro/integration)) to reach various app features. This allows integration with other apps and scripted access to app functionality.
trans-unit.source: Allows systemwide URLs (see [documentation](https://betterdisplay.pro/integration)) to reach various app features. This allows integration with other apps and scripted access to app functionality.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter systemomfattande URL:er (se [dokumentation](https://betterdisplay.pro/integration)) för att nå olika appfunktioner. Detta möjliggör integrering med andra appar och skriptad åtkomst till appfunktioner.

trans-unit.id: Apple Silicon Macs tend to freeze the display instead of letting it go to standby upon sleep when a virtual screen is being mirrored. This workaround that tries to fix this issue.

Syncing these is not recommended when combined brightness and software XDR upscaling is used (use native XDR upscaling instead).

Synkronisering av dessa rekommenderas inte när kombinerad ljusstyrka och XDR-uppskalning med programvara används (använd istället inbyggd XDR-uppskalning).

trans-unit.id: By default the app orders display first, then virtual screens, alphabetically. By providing an ordering string, you can redefine the data which serves as the basis of the alphabetical order and mix the virtual screen among the displays as well.
trans-unit.source: By default the app orders display first, then virtual screens, alphabetically. By providing an ordering string, you can redefine the data which serves as the basis of the alphabetical order and mix the virtual screen among the displays as well.
trans-unit.target: Som standard ordnar appen först skärmen och sedan de virtuella skärmarna i alfabetisk ordning. Genom att ange en ordningssträng kan du omdefiniera de data som ligger till grund för den alfabetiska ordningen och även blanda den virtuella skärmen bland skärmarna.

trans-unit.id: By default the app orders displays alphabetically in the app menu by their (displayed) name. By providing an ordering string, you can redefine the data which serves as the basis of the ordering.
trans-unit.source: By default the app orders displays alphabetically in the app menu by their (displayed) name. By providing an ordering string, you can redefine the data which serves as the basis of the ordering.
trans-unit.target: Som standard ordnar appen skärmar i alfabetisk ordning i appmenyn efter deras (visade) namn. Genom att tillhandahålla en beställningssträng kan du omdefiniera de data som ligger till grund för ordningen.

trans-unit.id: Combine hardware brightness control (if available), software dimming and XDR/HDR upscaling into one unified brightness control.

trans-unit.id: Combined brightness - software dimming switchover point
trans-unit.source: Combined brightness - software dimming switchover point

trans-unit.id: Combined brightness is not required with default settings as the native XDR brightness scale covers the entire configurable scale. Use only if you want to fine-tune the dimming curve below the configured XDR brightness scale minimum
trans-unit.source: Combined brightness is not required with default settings as the native XDR brightness scale covers the entire configurable scale. Use only if you want to fine-tune the dimming curve below the configured XDR brightness scale minimum

trans-unit.id: Compresses the allowed software brightness range between the specified value and 100%, affecting the software component of combined brightness control as well. This helps avoid accidentally setting the software brightness level too low or to zero.
trans-unit.source: Compresses the allowed software brightness range between the specified value and 100%, affecting the software component of combined brightness control as well. This helps avoid accidentally setting the software brightness level too low or to zero.

Detta hjälper till att undvika att oavsiktligt ställa in ljusstyrkan för programvaran för lågt eller till noll.

trans-unit.id: Configuration changes require reboot or activation.

trans-unit.id: Connected virtual screens will remain connected after this operation.

trans-unit.id: Connects the virtual screen and starts full screen streaming from the virtual screen to the display. Also sets up the full screen stream to automatically start whenever the display is connected.
trans-unit.source: Connects the virtual screen and starts full screen streaming from the virtual screen to the display. Also sets up the full screen stream to automatically start whenever the display is connected.

trans-unit.id: Create a virtual screen that matches to the aspect ratio of another display and associate the virtual screen with the display. Best for a scenario when the virtual screen should be streamed (e.g. portrait Sidecar) or mirrored to a display.
trans-unit.source: Create a virtual screen that matches to the aspect ratio of another display and associate the virtual screen with the display. Best for a scenario when the virtual screen should be streamed (e.g. portrait Sidecar) or mirrored to a display.

trans-unit.id: Create a virtual screen with a custom aspect ratio. You can also set up a custom resolution list with varying aspect ratios after creating the virtual screen.
trans-unit.source: Create a virtual screen with a custom aspect ratio. You can also set up a custom resolution list with varying aspect ratios after creating the virtual screen.

Definiera åtgärder för att hämta data

trans-unit.id: Define the crop area either by drawing the crop rectangle on the stream source screen or by keyboard shortcuts.
trans-unit.source: Define the crop area either by drawing the crop rectangle on the stream source screen or by keyboard shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: Definiera beskärningsområdet antingen genom att rita beskärningsrektangeln på skärmen för strömkällan eller genom kortkommandon på tangentbordet.

trans-unit.id: Defines how many logical steps the entire range is divided into. By default, it matches the number of fine steps available in the native macOS OSD (64).
trans-unit.source: Defines how many logical steps the entire range is divided into. By default, it matches the number of fine steps available in the native macOS OSD (64).
trans-unit.target: Definierar hur många logiska steg hela intervallet är uppdelat i. Som standard matchar det antalet fina steg som finns tillgängliga i macOS OSD (64).

trans-unit.id: Defines the TCP port the built-in HTTP server listens to.
trans-unit.source: Defines the TCP port the built-in HTTP server listens to.
trans-unit.target: Anger TCP-porten som den inbyggda HTTP-servern lyssnar på.

trans-unit.id: Defines the diagonal size the system perceives the display. If used for mirroring/streaming, it might optionally be matched to the target screen. Safe to leave empty as default. With custom resolution list of varying aspect ratios the actual reported size may be different.
trans-unit.source: Defines the diagonal size the system perceives the display. If used for mirroring/streaming, it might optionally be matched to the target screen. Safe to leave empty as default. With custom resolution list of varying aspect ratios the actual reported size may be different.
trans-unit.target: Definierar den diagonala storlek som systemet uppfattar att skärmen har. Om den används för spegling/streaming kan den eventuellt matchas med målskärmen. Det är säkert att lämna den tom som standard. Med en lista med anpassad upplösning och varierande bildförhållanden kan den faktiska rapporterade storleken vara annorlunda.

trans-unit.id: Defines the lower bound of brightness control in nits. Use 0 to allow full continuous dimming to black.
trans-unit.source: Defines the lower bound of brightness control in nits. Use 0 to allow full continuous dimming to black.
trans-unit.target: Definierar den nedre gränsen för ljusstyrkereglering i nits. Använd 0 för att tillåta full kontinuerlig dimning till svart.

trans-unit.id: Defines the number of logical steps in a fine adjustment step. By default, this equals one-quarter of a chiclet in the native macOS OSD (1 logical step).
trans-unit.source: Defines the number of logical steps in a fine adjustment step. By default, this equals one-quarter of a chiclet in the native macOS OSD (1 logical step).
trans-unit.target: Definierar antalet logiska steg i ett finjusteringssteg. Som standard motsvarar detta en fjärdedel av en chiclet i det ursprungliga macOS OSD (1 logiskt steg).

trans-unit.id: Defines the number of logical steps in a standard adjustment step. By default, this equals one full chiclet of the native macOS OSD (4 steps per chiclet; 16 chiclets × 4 steps = 64 total steps).
trans-unit.source: Defines the number of logical steps in a standard adjustment step. By default, this equals one full chiclet of the native macOS OSD (4 steps per chiclet; 16 chiclets × 4 steps = 64 total steps).
trans-unit.target: Definierar antalet logiska steg i ett standardjusteringssteg. Som standard motsvarar detta en hel chiclet av det ursprungliga macOS OSD (4 steg per chiclet; 16 chiclets × 4 steg = 64 steg totalt).

trans-unit.id: Defines the upper bound of brightness control in nits. Use 1000 for only allowing up to sustained full screen brightness.
trans-unit.source: Defines the upper bound of brightness control in nits. Use 1000 for only allowing up to sustained full screen brightness.
trans-unit.target: Definierar den övre gränsen för ljusstyrkan i nits. Använd 1000 för att endast tillåta upp till bibehållen ljusstyrka för hela skärmen.

trans-unit.id: Determines the placement of the OSD. Use 'Classic' for a more traditional (pre-macOS Tahoe) OSD placement and appearance.
trans-unit.source: Determines the placement of the OSD. Use 'Classic' for a more traditional (pre-macOS Tahoe) OSD placement and appearance.

trans-unit.id: Determines where the protected display should be positioned relative to the specified display. If you want to position the protected display to one of the corners, select either the relevant horizontal or vertical side and specify the offsets appropriately.
trans-unit.source: Determines where the protected display should be positioned relative to the specified display. If you want to position the protected display to one of the corners, select either the relevant horizontal or vertical side and specify the offsets appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer var den skyddade skärmen ska placeras i förhållande till den angivna skärmen. Om du vill placera den skyddade skärmen i ett av hörnen väljer du antingen den relevanta horisontella eller vertikala sidan och anger förskjutningarna på lämpligt sätt.

trans-unit.id: Determines whether display is affected by keyboard adjustments (video/audio controls).
trans-unit.source: Determines whether display is affected by keyboard adjustments (video/audio controls).
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer om skärmen påverkas av tangentbordsjusteringar (video/ljud-kontroller).

trans-unit.source: Device specific features can be configured and bound to predefined or custom controls configured under Displays > Overview > Custom Controls.

trans-unit.id: Disable this for a classic look.

trans-unit.source: Display groups provide a way to let various operations affect multiple displays. Features based on display groups include brightness and other image adjustment synchronization, UI scale matching, display layout management and more.

Displays will turn blank for a while and you will not be able to interact with your Mac. The process should take about 2-4 seconds.

Skärmarna blir svarta under en stund och du kan inte interagera med din Mac. Processen bör ta cirka 2-4 sekunder.

Factory color profiles are automatically created by the system whenever a display is connected. Over time, these profiles can accumulate.
Removing them is safe—macOS will recreate any necessary profiles the next time the display is connected.

Factory color profiles are automatically created by the system whenever a display is connected. Over time, these profiles can accumulate.

trans-unit.id: If the updated EDID contains new display identity (serial number, model ID, vendor ID), macOS will treat the display as a separate display. With this option enabled, %@ preserves continuity between the old and new identity during the current app session.
trans-unit.source: If the updated EDID contains new display identity (serial number, model ID, vendor ID), macOS will treat the display as a separate display. With this option enabled, %@ preserves continuity between the old and new identity during the current app session.

trans-unit.id: If this display group is active, no other display groups with lower priority can be active. If any other display group with higher priority is active, this display group cannot be active.
trans-unit.source: If this display group is active, no other display groups with lower priority can be active. If any other display group with higher priority is active, this display group cannot be active.

trans-unit.id:
If your display is not fully compatible with this feature, the app may not be able to turn the backlight off or turn it back on again!

If your display is not fully compatible with this feature, the app may not be able to turn the backlight off or turn it back on again!
Not all displays support DDC power operations. DDC power operations can cause (even serious) issues with some displays!

Om din skärm inte är helt kompatibel med den här funktionen kan det hända att appen inte kan stänga av eller sätta på bakgrundsbelysningen igen!
Alla bildskärmar stöder inte DDC-strömförsörjning. DDC-strömförsörjning kan orsaka (till och med allvarliga) problem med vissa skärmar!

trans-unit.id: Increase display brightness beyond 100%. Requires an Apple XDR display or a HDR capable external display in HDR mode. The feature works with color table adjustments enabled on Apple Silicon Macs or with it disabled (using Metal based overlay brightness control) on all platforms. Upscaling using Metal may increase CPU and GPU usage on some systems.
trans-unit.source: Increase display brightness beyond 100%. Requires an Apple XDR display or a HDR capable external display in HDR mode. The feature works with color table adjustments enabled on Apple Silicon Macs or with it disabled (using Metal based overlay brightness control) on all platforms. Upscaling using Metal may increase CPU and GPU usage on some systems.
trans-unit.target: Öka skärmens ljusstyrka till mer än 100%. Kräver en Apple XDR-skärm eller en HDR-kompatibel extern skärm i HDR-läge. Funktionen fungerar med färgtabelljusteringar aktiverade på Apple Silicon Mac-datorer eller med dem inaktiverade (med Metal-baserad kontroll av överlagrad ljusstyrka) på alla plattformar. Uppskalning med Metal kan öka CPU- och GPU-användningen på vissa system.

trans-unit.id: Layout protection enforces a configured arrangement for group member displays relative to each other. The feature can be used to make sure the displays are arranged properly after changing display resolutions, connecting new displays that are not part of the display group or dealing with displays that are not properly handled by the built-in display layout management of the operating system.

The feature can be used to make sure the displays are arranged properly after changing display resolutions, connecting new displays that are not part of the display group or dealing with displays that are not properly handled by the built-in display layout management of the operating system.

For the app to function correctly, configure DDC support to match your display’s capabilities. The app can assist if DDC detection is supported.

trans-unit.id: Sets the minimum allowed hardware brightness value (on its own scale) below which software dimming kicks-in when using combined brightness control. This setting is useful for those with PWM sensitivity as it prohibits backlight control from entering heavy PWM range, substituting it with software dimming instead.
trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum allowed hardware brightness value (on its own scale) below which software dimming kicks-in when using combined brightness control. This setting is useful for those with PWM sensitivity as it prohibits backlight control from entering heavy PWM range, substituting it with software dimming instead.
trans-unit.target: Ställer in det lägsta tillåtna ljusstyrkevärdet för hårdvara (på en egen skala) under vilket mjukvarudimning börjar gälla vid användning av kombinerad ljusstyrkereglering. Den här inställningen är användbar för personer med PWM-känslighet eftersom den förhindrar att bakgrundsbelysningen styrs in i PWM-området och istället ersätts med mjukvarudimning.

trans-unit.source: Skip displays in HDR or reference XDR mode

trans-unit.source: Soft-connect or disconnect a display or virtual screen.
trans-unit.target: Mjukanslut eller koppla från en skärm eller virtuell skärm.

trans-unit.id: Software control allows dimming even without hardware support and provides various other video adjustments. Required for combined brightness and XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.source: Software control allows dimming even without hardware support and provides various other video adjustments. Required for combined brightness and XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.target: Mjukvarukontroll möjliggör dimning även utan hårdvarustöd och ger flera andra videojusteringar. Krävs för kombinerad ljusstyrka och XDR/HDR-uppskalning.

trans-unit.id: Some Apple displays use Presets to manage display color reproduction, gamma, white point settings. Color Profiles can still be used to influence rendering to a limited extent however Presets work best when the factory default Color Profile is configured for the Apple display.
trans-unit.source: Some Apple displays use Presets to manage display color reproduction, gamma, white point settings. Color Profiles can still be used to influence rendering to a limited extent however Presets work best when the factory default Color Profile is configured for the Apple display.
trans-unit.target: XDR-skärmar använder XDR-förinställningar för att hantera skärmens färgåtergivning, gamma och vitpunktsinställningar. Färgprofiler kan fortfarande användas för att påverka återgivningen i begränsad omfattning, men XDR-förinställningarna fungerar bäst när den fabriksinställda färgprofilen är konfigurerad för XDR-skärmen.

trans-unit.id: Some displays do not support hardware brightness control in HDR mode. Enabling this for compatible displays allows brightness control while preserving unclipped HDR content.
trans-unit.source: Some displays do not support hardware brightness control in HDR mode. Enabling this for compatible displays allows brightness control while preserving unclipped HDR content.
trans-unit.target: Vissa skärmar har inte stöd för ljusstyrkereglering i hårdvara i HDR-läge. Om du aktiverar detta för kompatibla skärmar kan du kontrollera ljusstyrkan och samtidigt bevara oklippt HDR-innehåll.

trans-unit.id: Some displays forget changes made via DDC commands after sleep. With this enabled, the app reapplies DDC settings every time the display wakes.
trans-unit.source: Some displays forget changes made via DDC commands after sleep. With this enabled, the app reapplies DDC settings every time the display wakes.
trans-unit.target: Vissa skärmar glömmer ändringar som gjorts via DDC-kommandon efter sömn. När detta är aktiverat tillämpar appen DDC-inställningarna på nytt varje gång skärmen vaknar.

trans-unit.id: Some displays require an SCS (Save Current Settings) signal after DDC write so the operation takes effect. For the overwhelming majority of displays it is best to leave this setting off.
trans-unit.source: Some displays require an SCS (Save Current Settings) signal after DDC write so the operation takes effect. For the overwhelming majority of displays it is best to leave this setting off.
trans-unit.target: Vissa skärmar kräver en SCS-signal (Save Current Settings) efter DDC-skrivningen för att åtgärden ska träda i kraft. För de allra flesta skärmar är det bäst att låta denna inställning vara avstängd.

trans-unit.id: Synchronize value changes (delta) from sources to targets. This helps keep initial value differences between source and target (until minimum or maximum is reached). When this is disabled, absolute values are synced.
trans-unit.source: Synchronize value changes (delta) from sources to targets. This helps keep initial value differences between source and target (until minimum or maximum is reached). When this is disabled, absolute values are synced.

trans-unit.id: The DDC reset command might not work properly for all displays. You can also try using the built-in factory reset functionality of the display (usually accessible via the display OSD).
trans-unit.source: The DDC reset command might not work properly for all displays. You can also try using the built-in factory reset functionality of the display (usually accessible via the display OSD).
trans-unit.target: Kommandot för återställning av DDC kanske inte fungerar korrekt för alla skärmar. Du kan också prova att använda den inbyggda funktionen för fabriksåterställning i skärmen (vanligtvis tillgänglig via skärmens OSD).

trans-unit.id: The OSD appears on the affected display instead of the display with the active menu bar (similar to older macOS versions).
trans-unit.source: The OSD appears on the affected display instead of the display with the active menu bar (similar to older macOS versions).

trans-unit.id: The app automatically attempts to reconnect all displays when no connected display is present.
trans-unit.source: The app automatically attempts to reconnect all displays when no connected display is present.
trans-unit.target: Appen försöker automatiskt återansluta alla skärmar när det inte finns någon ansluten skärm.

trans-unit.id: The app can automatically connect and disconnect a virtual screen based on the availability of the display(s) it is associated with. It can also auto-start mirroring or streaming or follow the associated display's orientation.
trans-unit.source: The app can automatically connect and disconnect a virtual screen based on the availability of the display(s) it is associated with. It can also auto-start mirroring or streaming or follow the associated display's orientation.
trans-unit.target: Appen kan automatiskt ansluta och koppla bort en virtuell skärm baserat på tillgängligheten för den eller de skärmar som den är kopplad till. Den kan också automatiskt starta spegling eller streaming eller följa den associerade skärmens orientering.

trans-unit.id: The app menu icon will reflect the icon of the current main display. Enable if you don't like the default icon…
trans-unit.source: The app menu icon will reflect the icon of the current main display. Enable if you don't like the default icon…
trans-unit.target: Appens menyikon kommer att återspegla ikonen för den aktuella huvudskärmen. Aktivera om du inte gillar standardikonen…

trans-unit.id: The app menu will show this name instead of the system name for the display. If you want to change the system-wide name, you can do so by enabling the configuration override option and editing the system display name.
trans-unit.source: The app menu will show this name instead of the system name for the display. If you want to change the system-wide name, you can do so by enabling the configuration override option and editing the system display name.
trans-unit.target: Appmenyn visar detta namn i stället för systemnamnet för skärmen. Om du vill ändra det systemomfattande namnet kan du göra det genom att aktivera alternativet Configuration Override och redigera systemets visningsnamn.

trans-unit.id: The app normally does not restore full dimming upon wake or app startup to avoid confusion.
trans-unit.source: The app normally does not restore full dimming upon wake or app startup to avoid confusion.
trans-unit.target: Appen återställer normalt inte full dimning vid uppvaknande eller appstart för att undvika förvirring.

trans-unit.id: The app was launched using Rosetta. Some features won't work.
trans-unit.source: The app was launched using Rosetta. Some features won't work.
trans-unit.target: Appen startades med hjälp av Rosetta. Vissa funktioner kommer inte att fungera.

trans-unit.id: The app will apply the loaded EDID when this display is connected. The operation causes the screen to flicker and switch modes if existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. If the new EDID has different id data (vendor, model, serial), the display will be redetected as a different one. Hold ⇧ Shift on startup to enable safe mode and avoid auto-apply. Physically reconnect display to revert back to the original in case of serious trouble.
trans-unit.source: The app will apply the loaded EDID when this display is connected. The operation causes the screen to flicker and switch modes if existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. If the new EDID has different id data (vendor, model, serial), the display will be redetected as a different one. Hold ⇧ Shift on startup to enable safe mode and avoid auto-apply. Physically reconnect display to revert back to the original in case of serious trouble.
trans-unit.target: Appen kommer att använda den inlästa EDID när skärmen ansluts. Funktionen gör att skärmen flimrar och byter läge om det befintliga läget inte är tillgängligt med det uppdaterade EDID. Om den nya EDID:n har andra id-data (leverantör, modell, serie) kommer skärmen att detekteras på nytt som en annan skärm. Håll ned ⇧ Shift vid start för att aktivera felsäkert läge och undvika automatisk applicering. Återanslut bildskärmen fysiskt för att återgå till originalet vid allvarliga problem.

trans-unit.id:
The app will forget all stored DDC values and treat all controls as untouched. Sliders will revert to default neutral values.
This operation does not reset the display itself.
trans-unit.source:
The app will forget all stored DDC values and treat all controls as untouched. Sliders will revert to default neutral values.
This operation does not reset the display itself.
trans-unit.target:
Appen glömmer alla lagrade DDC-värden och behandlar alla reglage som orörda. Skjutreglagen återgår till neutrala standardvärden.
Den här åtgärden återställer inte själva skärmen.

trans-unit.id:
The app will reset all DDC feature settings to its defaults.
This operation does not reset the display itself.
trans-unit.source:
The app will reset all DDC feature settings to its defaults.
This operation does not reset the display itself.
trans-unit.target:
Appen återställer alla DDC-funktionsinställningar till standardvärdena.
Den här åtgärden återställer inte själva skärmen.

trans-unit.id: The built-in display is configured to be disconnected when an external display is connected. This setting will be re-enabled when the built-in display is manually disconnected again or the app is restarted.
trans-unit.source: The built-in display is configured to be disconnected when an external display is connected. This setting will be re-enabled when the built-in display is manually disconnected again or the app is restarted.
trans-unit.target: Den inbyggda skärmen är konfigurerad att kopplas bort när en extern skärm ansluts. Denna inställning återaktiveras när den inbyggda skärmen kopplas bort manuellt igen eller när appen startas om.

trans-unit.id: The built-in display of the iMac cannot be easily reconnected (lack of display cable, closable lid) in case of an application failure. Enable this setting with extra caution!
trans-unit.source: The built-in display of the iMac cannot be easily reconnected (lack of display cable, closable lid) in case of an application failure. Enable this setting with extra caution!
trans-unit.target: Den inbyggda bildskärmen i iMac kan inte enkelt återanslutas (brist på bildskärmskabel, stängbart lock) i händelse av ett programfel. Aktivera denna inställning med extra försiktighet!

trans-unit.id: The default input source list reflects commonly occurring assignments, but the actual list varies by display vendor/model. Try using the "LG alt" toggle for some newer LG displays if input control does not work!
trans-unit.source: The default input source list reflects commonly occurring assignments, but the actual list varies by display vendor/model. Try using the "LG alt" toggle for some newer LG displays if input control does not work!
trans-unit.target: Standardlistan över ingångskällor återspeglar vanligt förekommande uppdrag, men den faktiska listan varierar beroende på skärmtillverkare/modell. Prova att använda "LG alt"-knappen för vissa nyare LG-skärmar om inmatningskontrollen inte fungerar!

trans-unit.id: The display group is marked as exclusive while at least one other display group with higher priority is active.
trans-unit.source: The display group is marked as exclusive while at least one other display group with higher priority is active.
trans-unit.target: Skärmgruppen är markerad som exklusiv medan minst en annan skärmgrupp med högre prioritet är aktiv.

trans-unit.id: The display group will be activated or deactivated depending on the activation settings, configured group members and various other factors.
trans-unit.source: The display group will be activated or deactivated depending on the activation settings, configured group members and various other factors.
trans-unit.target: Skärmgruppen aktiveras eller avaktiveras beroende på aktiveringsinställningarna, konfigurerade gruppmedlemmar och olika andra faktorer.

trans-unit.id: The display group will not activate when other displays are connected beyond group members.
trans-unit.source: The display group will not activate when other displays are connected beyond group members.
trans-unit.target: Skärmgruppen kommer inte att aktiveras när andra skärmar är anslutna utöver gruppmedlemmarna.

trans-unit.id: The display may not be properly configured for DDC hardware brightness control and other similar features. Use detection and auto-configuration or adjust DDC settings manually.
trans-unit.source: The display may not be properly configured for DDC hardware brightness control and other similar features. Use detection and auto-configuration or adjust DDC settings manually.
trans-unit.target: Skärmen kanske inte är korrekt konfigurerad för DDC hårdvarukontroll av ljusstyrka och andra liknande funktioner. Använd detektering och autokonfiguration eller justera DDC-inställningarna manuellt.

trans-unit.id: The display might have limited DDC support
trans-unit.source: The display might have limited DDC support

trans-unit.id: The display or connection does not support DDC
trans-unit.source: The display or connection does not support DDC
trans-unit.target: Skärmen eller anslutningen stöder inte DDC

trans-unit.id: The display will be automatically disconnected upon detection or physical connect if it was disconnected using the app beforehand. This setting might cause unexpected issues (connect-disconnect cycle with incompatible displays, lack of any connected displays) - use with caution!
trans-unit.source: The display will be automatically disconnected upon detection or physical connect if it was disconnected using the app beforehand. This setting might cause unexpected issues (connect-disconnect cycle with incompatible displays, lack of any connected displays) - use with caution!
trans-unit.target: Skärmen kommer automatiskt att kopplas bort vid detektering eller fysisk anslutning om den kopplades bort med appen i förväg. Den här inställningen kan orsaka oväntade problem (cykel med anslutning och frånkoppling med inkompatibla skärmar, avsaknad av anslutna skärmar) - använd med försiktighet!

trans-unit.id: The duplicated group will be disabled by default.
trans-unit.source: The duplicated group will be disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Den duplicerade gruppen kommer att vara inaktiverad som standard.

trans-unit.id: The menu bar icon is aligned to the center relative to the app menu. Disable this for a more traditional look (align the menu bar icon to the left side of the app menu).
trans-unit.source: The menu bar icon is aligned to the center relative to the app menu. Disable this for a more traditional look (align the menu bar icon to the left side of the app menu).

trans-unit.id: The nits counter will offer clear (and slightly exaggerated) visual feedback during upscaling.
trans-unit.source: The nits counter will offer clear (and slightly exaggerated) visual feedback during upscaling.
trans-unit.target: Nits-räknaren ger tydlig (och något överdriven) visuell feedback under uppskalning.

trans-unit.id:
The operation completed successfully.

trans-unit.id: The operation could not be performed.
trans-unit.source: The operation could not be performed.

trans-unit.id:
The operation might cause the screen to flicker and switch mode if the existing mode is not available with the factory EDID. The display will be redetected as a different display if the current EDID has different identifiers.
In case of a failure, disconnect and reconnect the display physically.
trans-unit.source:
The operation might cause the screen to flicker and switch mode if the existing mode is not available with the factory EDID. The display will be redetected as a different display if the current EDID has different identifiers.
In case of a failure, disconnect and reconnect the display physically.
trans-unit.target:
Funktionen kan leda till att skärmen flimrar och byter läge om det befintliga läget inte är tillgängligt med fabriks-EDID. Skärmen kommer att detekteras på nytt som en annan skärm om den aktuella EDID har olika identifierare.
I händelse av fel ska du koppla bort och återansluta skärmen fysiskt.

trans-unit.id:
The operation might cause the screen to flicker and switch mode if the existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. The display will be redetected as a different display if the EDID has different identifiers.
In case of a failure, disconnect and reconnect the display physically.
trans-unit.source:
The operation might cause the screen to flicker and switch mode if the existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. The display will be redetected as a different display if the EDID has different identifiers.
In case of a failure, disconnect and reconnect the display physically.
trans-unit.target:
Det kan hända att skärmen flimrar och byter läge om det befintliga läget inte är tillgängligt med den uppdaterade EDID:n. Skärmen kommer att detekteras på nytt som en annan skärm om EDID har olika identifierare.
I händelse av fel ska du koppla bort och återansluta skärmen fysiskt.

trans-unit.id: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the 'display physical dimensions' setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.source: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the 'display physical dimensions' setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.target: Den fysiska dimensionen (som används för att beräkna skalningen av användargränssnittet) för en virtuell skärm bestäms i första hand av inställningen "rapporterad diagonalstorlek", som kan ändras ytterligare med inställningen "visa fysiska dimensioner" när den virtuella skärmen är ansluten.

trans-unit.id: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the `display physical dimensions` setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.source: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the `display physical dimensions` setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.target: Den fysiska dimensionen (som används för att beräkna skalningen av användargränssnittet) för en virtuell skärm bestäms i första hand av inställningen "rapporterad diagonalstorlek", som kan ändras ytterligare med inställningen "visa fysiska dimensioner" när den virtuella skärmen är ansluten.

trans-unit.id: The slider will omit resolutions that do not match the display's size in order to reduce clutter and make slider easier to use. Affects resolution keyboard shortcuts as well.
trans-unit.source: The slider will omit resolutions that do not match the display's size in order to reduce clutter and make slider easier to use. Affects resolution keyboard shortcuts as well.
trans-unit.target: Skjutreglaget kommer att utelämna upplösningar som inte matchar skärmens storlek för att minska röran och göra skjutreglaget enklare att använda. Påverkar även kortkommandon för upplösningar.

trans-unit.id: The system might reconnect the built-in display and other displays after wake from sleep to ensure GUI access. With this option enabled, the app forcefully disconnects these displays again. Post-wake main display will not be disconnected.
trans-unit.source: The system might reconnect the built-in display and other displays after wake from sleep to ensure GUI access. With this option enabled, the app forcefully disconnects these displays again. Post-wake main display will not be disconnected.
trans-unit.target: Systemet kan återansluta den inbyggda skärmen och andra skärmar efter uppvaknande från viloläge för att säkerställa GUI-åtkomst. När det här alternativet är aktiverat kopplar appen tvångsmässigt bort dessa skärmar igen. Huvudskärmen efter uppvaknandet kopplas inte bort.

trans-unit.source: There is no group member present.

trans-unit.id: These three identifiers (serial number, vendor and model ID) serve as the basis for display identification in macOS. If any of these three identifiers are changed, the system will assign a new identity (UUID) to the virtual screen and treat it as newly connected display.
trans-unit.source: These three identifiers (serial number, vendor and model ID) serve as the basis for display identification in macOS. If any of these three identifiers are changed, the system will assign a new identity (UUID) to the virtual screen and treat it as newly connected display.
trans-unit.target: Dessa tre identifierare (serienummer, tillverkar- och modell-ID) utgör grunden för skärmidentifiering i macOS. Om någon av dessa tre identifierare ändras kommer systemet att tilldela en ny identitet (UUID) till den virtuella skärmen och behandla den som en nyansluten skärm.

trans-unit.id: This allows additional image adjustment control options when color table adjustments are not enabled or available. Comes with a slight performance penalty. This feature is always active when software brightness upscaling is turned on while color table adjustments are not available.
trans-unit.source: This allows additional image adjustment control options when color table adjustments are not enabled or available. Comes with a slight performance penalty. This feature is always active when software brightness upscaling is turned on while color table adjustments are not available.
trans-unit.target: Detta ger ytterligare kontrollalternativ för bildjustering när färgtabelljusteringar inte är aktiverade eller tillgängliga. Detta medför en liten prestandaförlust. Den här funktionen är alltid aktiv när uppskalning av ljusstyrka i programvara är aktiverad medan färgtabelljusteringar inte är tillgängliga.

trans-unit.id: This allows advanced dimming, color adjustments and other features like software XDR/HDR upscaling. Note: color adjustments clip HDR content when in active use. If this option is disabled, the app will fall back to overlay based dimming control and uses Metal for software XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.source: This allows advanced dimming, color adjustments and other features like software XDR/HDR upscaling. Note: color adjustments clip HDR content when in active use. If this option is disabled, the app will fall back to overlay based dimming control and uses Metal for software XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.target: Detta möjliggör avancerad dimning, färgjusteringar och andra funktioner som XDR/HDR-uppskalning med programvara. Obs: färgjusteringar klipper HDR-innehåll när det används aktivt. Om det här alternativet inaktiveras återgår appen till överläggsbaserad dimmerkontroll och använder Metal för XDR/HDR-uppskalning i programvara.

trans-unit.id: This allows the dimming or image adjustment overlay to take effect on the lock screen and on spaces where it is normally ineffective.
trans-unit.source: This allows the dimming or image adjustment overlay to take effect on the lock screen and on spaces where it is normally ineffective.
trans-unit.target: Detta gör att dimning eller bildjusteringsöverlägg även fungerar på låsskärmen.

trans-unit.id: This applies both to physically connecting an external display and using the app to reconnect one. However, the app will not reconnect the built-in display if you allow all displays to be disconnected!
trans-unit.source: This applies both to physically connecting an external display and using the app to reconnect one. However, the app will not reconnect the built-in display if you allow all displays to be disconnected!
trans-unit.target: Detta gäller både för att fysiskt ansluta en extern skärm och för att använda appen för att återansluta en. Appen kommer dock inte att återansluta den inbyggda skärmen om du tillåter att alla skärmar kopplas bort!

trans-unit.id: This can be a result of disabled DDC/CI support (check the display's OSD), display firmware limitations or connection issues. Many TVs and TV-derived smart monitors do not support DDC. If the issue cannot be resolved either by changing display settings or fixing cable issues, you should disable DDC support.
trans-unit.source: This can be a result of disabled DDC/CI support (check the display's OSD), display firmware limitations or connection issues. Many TVs and TV-derived smart monitors do not support DDC. If the issue cannot be resolved either by changing display settings or fixing cable issues, you should disable DDC support.
trans-unit.target: Detta kan bero på inaktiverat DDC/CI-stöd (kontrollera skärmens OSD), begränsningar i skärmens inbyggda programvara eller anslutningsproblem. Många TV-apparater och TV-deriverade smarta monitorer har inte stöd för DDC. Om problemet inte kan lösas genom att ändra bildskärmsinställningarna eller åtgärda kabelproblem bör du inaktivera DDC-stödet.

trans-unit.id: This configures how the data associated with the currently configured display is matched to a detected display during the configuration/detection process. Changing this setting might cause a display to be recognized as previously unconnected and disassociate existing saved display configuration data. System UUID match uses the MacOS default identification. When set to use basic identifiers, the app identifies the display by its vendor/model IDs and serial number. With extended it also uses product name, alphanumeric serial number, and production date. With port and location the app also considers hardware connectivity data.
trans-unit.source: This configures how the data associated with the currently configured display is matched to a detected display during the configuration/detection process. Changing this setting might cause a display to be recognized as previously unconnected and disassociate existing saved display configuration data. System UUID match uses the MacOS default identification. When set to use basic identifiers, the app identifies the display by its vendor/model IDs and serial number. With extended it also uses product name, alphanumeric serial number, and production date. With port and location the app also considers hardware connectivity data.
trans-unit.target: Detta konfigurerar hur data som är associerade med den aktuella konfigurerade displayen matchas med en detekterad display under konfigurations- och detekteringsprocessen. Om du ändrar den här inställningen kan det hända att en skärm identifieras som tidigare oansluten och att befintliga sparade konfigurationsdata för skärmen kopplas bort. Matchning av system-UUID använder MacOS standardidentifiering. När appen är inställd på att använda grundläggande identifierare identifierar den bildskärmen med hjälp av dess leverantörs-/modell-ID och serienummer. Med utökad användning används även produktnamn, alfanumeriskt serienummer och produktionsdatum. Med plats tar appen även hänsyn till data om maskinvaruanslutning.

trans-unit.id: This control is now a placeholder, does not perform any action.
trans-unit.source: This control is now a placeholder, does not perform any action.
trans-unit.target: Denna kontroll är nu en platshållare som inte utför någon åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: This custom control is configured for one or more displays or display groups. Deleting it will also remove it from them.

trans-unit.id: This display group does not have member displays.
trans-unit.source: This display group does not have member displays.

trans-unit.id:
This display is the main display. Are you sure you want to turn the display off?
Please note that not all displays support DDC power operations and some displays may not behave as expected. If you power off your display, you will have to power it back on manually.
trans-unit.source:
This display is the main display. Are you sure you want to turn the display off?
Please note that not all displays support DDC power operations and some displays may not behave as expected. If you power off your display, you will have to power it back on manually.
trans-unit.target:
Den här skärmen är huvudskärm. Är du säker på att du vill stänga av skärmen?
Observera att inte alla skärmar stöder DDC-strömförsörjning och att vissa skärmar kanske inte beter sig som förväntat. Om du stänger av skärmen måste du slå på den igen manuellt.

trans-unit.id: This format string specifies how the control's internal value is formatted and sent to the device.

trans-unit.target: Denna formatsträng anger hur kontrollens interna värde ska formateras och skickas till enheten.

trans-unit.id: This is a workaround of an issue present in some versions of macOS Sonoma which occasionally prevents a display's custom configuration to be loaded properly. With this setting the app attempts to reinitialize the display if flexible scaling resolutions seem to be missing.
trans-unit.source: This is a workaround of an issue present in some versions of macOS Sonoma which occasionally prevents a display's custom configuration to be loaded properly. With this setting the app attempts to reinitialize the display if flexible scaling resolutions seem to be missing.
trans-unit.target: Detta är en lösning på ett problem som finns i vissa versioner av macOS Sonoma som ibland förhindrar att en skärms anpassade konfiguration laddas korrekt. Med den här inställningen försöker appen att initiera skärmen på nytt om flexibla skalningsupplösningar verkar saknas.

trans-unit.id: This is in addition to the configured wake delay (%@ seconds), configuration delay (%@ seconds) and the time it takes to configure the displays.
trans-unit.source: This is in addition to the configured wake delay (%1$@ seconds), configuration delay (%2$@ seconds) and the time it takes to configure the displays.
trans-unit.target: Detta är utöver den konfigurerade väckningsfördröjningen (%1$@ sekunder), konfigurationsfördröjningen (%2$@ sekunder) och den tid det tar att konfigurera skärmarna.

trans-unit.id: This is required for color adjustments and a better software dimming and XDR/HDR upscaling experience. Recommended to leave enabled. Turn this off for compatibility with some third party apps that also alter system colors.
trans-unit.source: This is required for color adjustments and a better software dimming and XDR/HDR upscaling experience. Recommended to leave enabled. Turn this off for compatibility with some third party apps that also alter system colors.
trans-unit.target: Detta krävs för färgjusteringar och en bättre upplevelse av mjukvarudimning och XDR/HDR-uppskalning. Rekommenderas att vara aktiverad. Stäng av detta för kompatibilitet med vissa appar från tredje part som också ändrar systemfärger.

trans-unit.id: This is the default display group. This group cannot be removed but can be disabled or made inactive by changing activation settings.
trans-unit.source: This is the default display group. This group cannot be removed but can be disabled or made inactive by changing activation settings.
trans-unit.target: Detta är den förvalda skärmgruppen. Den här gruppen kan inte tas bort, men kan inaktiveras eller göras inaktiv genom att ändra aktiveringsinställningarna.

trans-unit.id:

trans-unit.id:
This should remove displays from the display layout and make them enter standby mode on compatible systems.
Some displays are not compatible with this feature and may not turn off or remain turned off.
If you can't turn the display back on using the app, try reconnecting the display manually (or in case of the MacBook display, close and open the lid).
trans-unit.source:
This should remove displays from the display layout and make them enter standby mode on compatible systems.
Some displays are not compatible with this feature and may not turn off or remain turned off.
If you can't turn the display back on using the app, try reconnecting the display manually (or in case of the MacBook display, close and open the lid).

Detta bör ta bort skärmar från skärmlayouten och få dem att gå in i standby-läge på kompatibla system.
Vissa bildskärmar är inte kompatibla med den här funktionen och kanske inte stängs av eller förblir avstängda.
Om du inte kan slå på skärmen igen med appen kan du försöka återansluta skärmen manuellt (eller stänga och öppna locket om det gäller MacBook-skärmen).

trans-unit.id:
This should remove the display from the display layout and make the display enter standby mode.

This should remove the display from the display layout and make the display enter standby mode.

trans-unit.id:
This should remove the display from the display layout.
Please note that on Intel Macs (such as this Mac) the feature might not work as expected!
IMPORTANT: While the display is in a disconnected state (via the app), physically turning the display off, removing the cable or (for a built-in display) closing the lid may result in an inability to turn any displays back on (until a reboot)!
trans-unit.source:
This should remove the display from the display layout.

IMPORTANT: While the display is in a disconnected state (via the app), physically turning the display off, removing the cable or (for a built-in display) closing the lid may result in an inability to turn any displays back on (until a reboot)!

Detta bör ta bort skärmen från skärmlayouten.

VIKTIGT: När skärmen är frånkopplad (via appen) kan det hända att det inte går att slå på någon skärm igen (förrän efter en omstart) om du fysiskt stänger av skärmen, tar bort kabeln eller (för en inbyggd skärm) stänger locket!

trans-unit.id: To make your Apple keyboard's brightness and volume keys control your external display, please add the app to **System Settings > Privacy & Security > Accessibility**! After this, you'll have to restart the app. Alternatively, you can disable native keyboard control in Settings.

trans-unit.id: When HDR upscaling is enabled while hardware brightness control is disabled, the app uses a continuous brightness scale between zero and the calibrated max upscale value. Due to this the neutral setting (100% brightness, when on-screen HDR content is unclipped) might not fall to an OSD chiclet boundary which makes it difficult to attain via the shortcut keys. To fix this an additional mid-chiclet step at 100% brightness is inserted.
trans-unit.source: When HDR upscaling is enabled while hardware brightness control is disabled, the app uses a continuous brightness scale between zero and the calibrated max upscale value. Due to this the neutral setting (100% brightness, when on-screen HDR content is unclipped) might not fall to an OSD chiclet boundary which makes it difficult to attain via the shortcut keys. To fix this an additional mid-chiclet step at 100% brightness is inserted.
trans-unit.target: När HDR-uppskalning är aktiverad medan hårdvarans ljusstyrkereglering är inaktiverad använder appen en kontinuerlig ljusstyrkeskala mellan noll och det kalibrerade maxvärdet för uppskalning. På grund av detta kan det hända att den neutrala inställningen (100% ljusstyrka, när HDR-innehållet på skärmen är oklippt) inte faller till en OSD-chicletgräns, vilket gör det svårt att nå den via snabbknapparna. För att åtgärda detta har ett extra steg i mitten av chikleten vid 100% ljusstyrka lagts in.

trans-unit.id: When a watched display's resolution changes, the resolution of all suitable group members are updated as a consequence to match the UI scaling of the watched display.
trans-unit.source: When a watched display's resolution changes, the resolution of all suitable group members are updated as a consequence to match the UI scaling of the watched display.
trans-unit.target: När upplösningen på en bevakad skärm ändras, uppdateras upplösningen för alla lämpliga gruppmedlemmar för att matcha UI-skalan på den bevakade skärmen.

trans-unit.id: When enabled, %@ uses a custom, app-drawn OSD instead of the native system OSD.
trans-unit.source: When enabled, %@ uses a custom, app-drawn OSD instead of the native system OSD.

trans-unit.id: When enabled, this display will not trigger the disconnection of the built-in display when it is set to disconnect upon the connection of an external display.
trans-unit.source: When enabled, this display will not trigger the disconnection of the built-in display when it is set to disconnect upon the connection of an external display.
trans-unit.target: När den här skärmen är aktiverad kommer den inte att utlösa bortkoppling av den inbyggda skärmen när den är inställd på att kopplas bort vid anslutning av en extern skärm.

trans-unit.id: When expanding a menu item, automatically hide other items under the given device / menu block. This helps keep the menu smaller.
trans-unit.source: When expanding a menu item, automatically hide other items under the given device / menu block. This helps keep the menu smaller.
trans-unit.target: När du expanderar ett menyalternativ döljer du automatiskt andra alternativ under den givna enheten/menyblocket. Detta hjälper till att hålla menyn mindre.

trans-unit.id: When the app detects that the active audio device supports native volume control in macOS while it listens to media keys, it forwards the appropriate operations to the operating system.
trans-unit.source: When the app detects that the active audio device supports native volume control in macOS while it listens to media keys, it forwards the appropriate operations to the operating system.

trans-unit.id: When the display is set as main, the lower limit is 30% for combined or software brightness, 10% for Apple hardware brightness, 0% for DDC hardware brightness.
trans-unit.source: When the display is set as main, the lower limit is 30% for combined or software brightness, 10% for Apple hardware brightness, 0% for DDC hardware brightness.
trans-unit.target: När skärmen är inställd som huvudskärmen är den nedre gränsen 30% eller kombinerad ljusstyrka eller mjukvaruljusstyrka, 10% för Apple-hårdvaruljusstyrka, 0% för DDC-hårdvaruljusstyrka.

trans-unit.id: When this is enabled, syncing won't affect displays in HDR mode or XDR displays set to a reference Apple Display Preset.
trans-unit.source: When this is enabled, syncing won't affect displays in HDR mode or XDR displays set to a reference Apple Display Preset.
trans-unit.target: När detta är aktiverat påverkar synkroniseringen inte skärmar i HDR-läge eller XDR-skärmar som är inställda på en referens XDR-förinställning.

trans-unit.id: When this is enabled, the app will use hardware brightness for combined brightness control instead of the SDR peak brightness adjustment control (HDR brightness control) provided by macOS. You can still adjust the SDR peak brightness in Control Center - these adjustments will influence the upscaling (if available) headroom provided by the app. Not all displays support hardware brightness control in HDR mode.
trans-unit.source: When this is enabled, the app will use hardware brightness for combined brightness control instead of the SDR peak brightness adjustment control (HDR brightness control) provided by macOS. You can still adjust the SDR peak brightness in Control Center - these adjustments will influence the upscaling (if available) headroom provided by the app. Not all displays support hardware brightness control in HDR mode.
trans-unit.target: När detta är aktiverat kommer appen att använda hårdvaruljusstyrka för kombinerad ljusstyrkereglering istället för SDR-toppljusstyrkeregleringen (HDR-ljusstyrkereglering) som tillhandahålls av macOS. Du kan fortfarande justera SDR-toppljusstyrkan i Kontrollcenter - dessa justeringar kommer att påverka uppskalningsutrymmet (om tillgängligt) som tillhandahålls av appen. Inte alla skärmar stöder hårdvarukontroll av ljusstyrka i HDR-läge.

trans-unit.id: With this enabled Sidecar displays disconnected using the app will remain in the display list for easy reconnect. Sidecar displays disconnected outside of the app or before app startup are not listed.
trans-unit.source: With this enabled Sidecar displays disconnected using the app will remain in the display list for easy reconnect. Sidecar displays disconnected outside of the app or before app startup are not listed.
trans-unit.target: Med detta aktiverat kommer Sidecar-skärmar som kopplats bort med appen att finnas kvar i skärmlistan för enkel återanslutning. Sidecar-skärmar som kopplas bort utanför appen eller innan appen startas visas inte i listan.

trans-unit.id: With this enabled scale matching will affect displays that have resolution configuration protection enabled. The protected resolution will be updated as well.
trans-unit.source: With this enabled scale matching will affect displays that have resolution configuration protection enabled. The protected resolution will be updated as well.
trans-unit.target: När detta är aktiverat kommer skalmatchning att påverka skärmar som har ett aktiverat skydd för upplösningskonfiguration. Den skyddade upplösningen kommer också att uppdateras.

trans-unit.id: With this enabled the app will perform the scale matching operation when the resolution of a watched display was changed by the system or by some other app. If the resolution of multiple watched displays are changed (for example, because of a layout change), no action is taken to avoid ambiguity.
trans-unit.source: With this enabled the app will perform the scale matching operation when the resolution of a watched display was changed by the system or by some other app. If the resolution of multiple watched displays are changed (for example, because of a layout change), no action is taken to avoid ambiguity.
trans-unit.target: Om detta är aktiverat kommer appen att utföra skalmatchning när upplösningen på en visad skärm har ändrats av systemet eller av någon annan app. Om upplösningen för flera övervakade skärmar ändras (t.ex. på grund av en layoutändring) vidtas ingen åtgärd för att undvika tvetydighet.

trans-unit.id: With this option selected, the app will leave native brightness keys under macOS control if only Apple displays are connected with no additional software brightness control features enabled. In this case however various settings (like "Make fine scale default" or control "All suitable screens" simultaneously) that modify the default behavior of the brightness keys will not apply.
trans-unit.source: With this option selected, the app will leave native brightness keys under macOS control if only Apple displays are connected with no additional software brightness control features enabled. In this case however various settings (like "Make fine scale default" or control "All suitable screens" simultaneously) that modify the default behavior of the brightness keys will not apply.
trans-unit.target: Om det här alternativet är valt kommer appen att lämna de inbyggda ljusstyrketangenterna under macOS-kontroll om endast Apple-skärmar är anslutna utan att några ytterligare funktioner för ljusstyrka i programvaran är aktiverade. I det här fallet kommer dock olika inställningar (som "Gör finskalig standard" eller kontrollera "Alla lämpliga skärmar" samtidigt) som ändrar standardbeteendet för ljusstyrketangenterna inte att gälla.
